name: ✪2Doublebeds 4m to Downtown walk to subway freepk✪
neighborhood_overview:
Convenient location at walking distance to subway, close to downtown and less than 20 mn drive to Logan airport.
Enjoy Free Street parking next or around the house- please pay attention to the street cleaning sign Wednesday and Thursday from midnight to 7am. Laundromat at walking distance.
Bike Rental 2 minutes away.
Church at walking distance. There is a barbershop and beauty salon near the house.
description:
Blending modern conveniences with historic charm, this newly remodeled house features:
5 bedrooms,2 bath, kitchen. Free Wifi
Your room has 2 Double beds.
✔Washer/Dryer(coin)
4 mi to Convention, downtown
Near Universities, bars, restaurants
18mn to Logan Airport
✔Fully equipped kitchen. Free coffee/tea
Free Street Prk
✔12 walk to subway. 8 mns to Dorchester brewing, South Bay center & beach
Lugagge drop off early/pick up later
We love and look forward to hosting you

The space
Located just 4 miles to Downtown, Boston convention Center. Your house is decorated with much love and care. Located on the 3rd floor of a three- family colonial house with beautiful landscaping and well maintained. Relax outside in your outdoor sofa and enjoy a meal outside in your table.
